summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of two-grid generation engines completed. Both LTP_LADDER and DEPTH_LADDER modes are fully functional with proper UI controls, mode switching, and grid regeneration.
passed_tests: LTP_LADDER mode generates symmetric ladder around mid-price (default mode)
DEPTH_LADDER mode anchors to best bid/ask based on BUY/SELL side
Grid mode toggle in settings panel works (LTP ↔ DEPTH)
Mode indicator shows 'LTP' or 'DEPTH' in header correctly
Bid/Ask prices displayed below main price (B: ₹X.XX A: ₹X.XX format)
Settings panel Grid Configuration section fully functional
Levels Per Side slider changes block count (5-25 range)
Tick Size slider changes price increments (₹0.01-₹1.00 range)
Block prices use correct INR formatting with ₹ symbol
Switching BUY/SELL in DEPTH mode regenerates grid with new prices
Grid layout adapts to block count (5x3 grid for 15 blocks)
Block interaction and arming functionality works
Settings panel sections (Grid Configuration, Simulation) properly organized
Visual design and theming consistent throughout
